title: Miranda targeted by gross prankster
text:
Miranda Kerr targeted by serial prankster at Paris Fashion Week News Corp Australia Network Miranda Kerr targeted by serial prankster at Paris Fashion Week News Corp Australia Network Serial pest steals a kiss from Miranda Kerr 0:22 
Serial pest Vitalii Sediuk steals a kiss from Miranda Kerr in Paris. Courtesy: Youtube/Mr Sediuk October 8th 2015 3 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ 
HE’S infamous for crawling beneath America Ferrera’s skirt at Cannes, shoving a shell-shocked Kim Kardashian and receiving assault charges from a ruffled Brad Pitt. 
Ukrainian prankster Vitalii Sediuk is showing no sign of giving up his day job, as he targets more A-listers at Paris Fashion Week. 
The fearless troublemaker set his sights on Aussie supermodel Miranda Kerr yesterday, sneaking up for a kiss as she posed for photographs outside the Louis Vuitton show. Miranda Kerr poses as she arrives at Louis Vuitton's Spring-Summer 2016 ready-to-wear fashion show. Picture: AP Miranda Kerr remains calm outside Louis Vuitton. Picture: Getty Prankster Vitalii Sediuk sneaks up for a kiss. Picture: Splash Miranda Kerr makes her way to the Louis Vuitton show during Paris Fashion Week. Picture: AFP Vitalii Sediuk gives ‘bunny ears’ as he is escorted away. Picture: Getty Anna Wintour at the Chanel show in Paris. Picture: Getty Matchy matchy ... Miranda in black and white. Picture: Splash Evan in black and white. Picture: Splash 1 of n 
Coming days after his run-in with Vogue Editor Anna Wintour, the model mum defused the situation remaining poised as she proceeded to make her way inside. 
“Congratulations @nicolasghesquiereofficial,” Miranda captioned an Instagram post. “Such an incredible show.” 
Kerr stunned in a Louis Vuitton ensemble as she put her killer pins on display. Other Stories
